subject: "plain" formatter broken in Ant w/ JUnit 4.x?
msgSnippet: Apologies if this has been discussed before, but I found nothing in the FAQ or in the archives since 4.x s release on this specific topic. I just switched from
messageBody:
Apologies if this has been discussed before, but I found nothing in the
FAQ or in the archives since 4.x's release on this specific topic. I
just switched from JUnit 3.8.1 to 4.1, and now the JUnit Ant task
doesn't print the test names when I use formatter="plain" instead of
formatter="brief". Instead, it always prints "unknown," like so:

[junit] Testcase: unknown took 0.02 sec

All tests implement suite() by returning JUnit4TestAdapter, which I
suspect is the culprit.
